1.title: New Beiginnings
1.plot: Mnqobi and Palesa finally get married, but normal life is cut short by news that Welcome is back to finish off the Simelanes. Dumile is totally unprepared to discover a secret that Thembi can no longer hide.

2.title: The Agreement
2.plot: When Dumile discovers that Thembi is planning to put Mnqobi's baby up for adoption, she quickly volunteers to raise the child as her own.

3.title: The Tables Turn
3.plot: Mnqobi and Mthandeni find the house where Welcome has been staying and set a trap for him. Palesa visits Thembi in the asylum and they form a connection, which takes them both by surprise.

4.title: The Homecoming
4.plot: Released from the asylum, Thembi returns to Bulalela to reclaim her family home, which has been left to ruin since the fire 19 years ago.

5.title: Friends and Enemies
5.plot: Thembi begins to fix up her family home when Palesa returns unexpectedly, making Thembi uncomfortable. Mnqobi's daughter Andile and his business partner, Radebe, meet in secret to discuss the company.

6.title: Bulalela
6.plot: Thembi and Palesa spend time together in Bulalela, but must be cautious of Mnqobi's uncles, who could discover that they are falling in love.

7.title: Prisoner
7.plot: After discovering that Thembi is pregnant with his son, Mnqobi locks her in his house, making her his prisoner until she gives birth.

8.title: Mother
8.plot: With Thembi captive until the baby is born, she and Palesa are able to carry on their secret affair right under Mnqobi's nose. Dumile tells Phindi its time to get back to school.

9.title: Rapist
9.plot: Mnqobi is enraged, having discovered Palesa and Thembi's affair . Meanwhile at work, Andile sets in motion her final plan to oust Mnqobi from his own business.

10.title: Family
10.plot: With the imminent arrival of his first son, Mnqobi tries to get his family in order. With great effort, he tries to repair his relationship with his daughter.

11.title: Life and Death
11.plot: Thembi gives birth and Mnqobi is elated to finally have the male heir he always wished for. In his euphoria he asks Thembi to marry him. Palesa takes off in hot pursuit and Mnqobi suffers a heart attack.

12.title: The Heir
12.plot: Mnqobi recuperates in the hospital when Rabotho arrives and serves him an arrest warrant, charging him with Spikiri's murder. Dumile goes to Bulalela to try retrieve the child that was supposed to be hers.

13.title: Umlilo
13.plot: Mnqobi escapes from the hospital and hurries down to Bulalela to reclaim his son and heir. The final showdown for the Simelani/ Kumkani heir begins.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Blame
1.plot: Dumile wakes in hospital, having lost the baby. As her memory returns she has to decide whether to point the finger of blame at Mnqobi for having shot her, or lie and say it was Thembi AKA Khwezi.

2.title: Back to Business
2.plot: Mnqobi is full of liquor and self pity as he tries figure out how to get his life back together. Shandu, the prosecutor in Thembi's case throws him bone - an opportunity to transport food aid for an NGO.

3.title: The Bail Hearing
3.plot: Mnqobi helps secure Thembi's release, while also procuring a car bomb to kill her when she flees. Mnqobi arranges with Mthandeni to put a hit on Spikiri. Mnqobi shares his secret and reveals to Shandu he killed Thembi's family.

4.title: The Faster You Run
4.plot: Mnqobi is relived that Thembi escaped the bombing plot. He organizes a cleansing ceremony in an effort to turn over a new leaf. During his cleansing ceremony, Mnqobi is manipulated back to his plan of vengeance by a sangoma corrupted by his cousin Mthandeni.

5.title: The Dinner Date
5.plot: Dumile feels betrayed by Shandu and tires of Spikiri's advances. Mnqobi woos Dumile with a diamond necklace and a romantic dinner and asks her to move back in with the family. Meanwhile Spikiri ups his game and promises Dumi a romantic weekend away. Dumi goes to meet Spikiri, but he doesn't show, and an angry Dumi calls Mnqobi and agrees to move back with him until...

6.title: Loose Ends
6.plot: Thembi is tying loose ends, trying to get rid of evidence against her. Meanwhile Dumi follows a similar path trying to lock down testimony to put Thembi away forever. It's a race against time for each side to build a case.

7.title: The Trial Begins
7.plot: Day 1 of the trial gets underway. Thembi pleads not guilty to all charges except identity theft and marriage under a false name. Dumile gives an emotional account of life with Thembi, only to be crushed on the stand by Vuyo. Phindi experiences the same fate. The Herbalist changes course, claims to not know Thembi. Wesley is also a no show. Mnqobi thinks the case is blown.

8.title: Miscarriage of Justice
8.plot: Dumile and Mnqobi have a cold wedding and the trial continues with Mnqobi on the stand. Meanwhile Thembi finds out that Andile is involved with Judge Ntuli's son and threatens to leak the information to cause a mistrial. Vuyo tells her to hold back, he can break Mnqobi and make him admit that he shot Dumile.

9.title: Defence
9.plot: The prosecution rests and Vuyo and Thembi prepare their defense which will prove to everyone that she has been a victim of his uncle's revenge plot. With all the people who could expose her lies out of the way, Thembi easily convinces everyone of her tragic tale of years of abuse from the men in her life, but Dumi has a plan of her own. In the mean time Spikiri and the Minister are ready to make a move on Mnqobi.

10.title: A Change of Plea
10.plot: Thembi and Vuyo change their defense strategy to 'temporary insanity', Thembi sets out to convince the psychiatrist that she was temporarily insane when she committed the crimes but she's now sane. Andile and Zuko discover something about Thembi that might be useful for the trial. Mnqobi and Radebe go into business together.

11.title: Welcome Returns
11.plot: Welcome goes on the hunt for Mnqobi, and tracks Andile down. Zuko sets him on Thembi's path. Andile agrees to work for her father after getting expelled from University. Dumile accepts the marriage after negotiations by Mnqobi's uncles.

12.title: Under Seige
12.plot: Welcome escapes death to carry out his plan to destroy the Simelane family. Phindile is kidnapped. Lobola negotiations are almost ruined by Shandu's brother revealing she prefers women, Shandu proves her love for Mnqobi - the wedding is on.

13.title: Final Revenge
13.plot: It's the day of Mnqobi and Shandu's engagement party, festivities are hampered by Welcome being on the loose, and Mnqobi's failure to show up. Dumile goes after the abductor in an effort to save her family, using Thembi as an unlikely ally.
